name: Sahil Patel
warning_signs: Decreased urine output or dark-colored urine
follow_up_instructions: Limit sodium intake to 2000mg per day
Weigh yourself daily and report sudden weight gain (>2 lbs in 24 hours)
Restrict fluid intake to 1.5 liters per day
discharge_summary:
Patient Sahil Patel was admitted on 2025-09-05 with Chronic Kidney Disease Stage 3. 
During hospitalization, patient was managed with Sevelamer 800mg with meals, Aspirin 81mg daily, Calcitriol 0.25mcg daily. 
Procedures performed included Ultrasound-guided kidney drainage.
Patient's condition improved and was stable at discharge. 
Discharged home with instructions to follow up with nephrologist and continue medications as prescribed. 
Patient educated on warning signs and dietary restrictions.
